articles.description: The FIA wants to limit the ways its leadership can be held to account for bad governance after allegations were made against its president.

articles.description: The Denver Broncos strengthen their grip on an NFL play-off spot as they come from behind to beat the Cleveland Browns 41-32.

articles.description: Double Olympic champion Remco Evenepoel has been hospitalised after a crash on Tuesday, his team Soudal-Quick Step says.

articles.description: The Football Association is to remind Crystal Palace captain Marc Guehi and the Selhurst Park club that religious messaging on their kit is banned.
articles.title: FA to remind Marc Guehi & Crystal Palace about religious messaging
